lld_hsi2c_datatfr_params_s Struct Reference
HS I2C Driver API

lld_hsi2c_datatfr_params_s contains the I2C transfer parameters. This is passed as an argument to lld_i2c_transfer() API. More...

#include <lld_hsi2c.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t slaveAddr
 
uint8_t * buffer
 
uint32_t bufLen
 
uint32_t flags
 
uint32_t timeout
 

Detailed Description

lld_hsi2c_datatfr_params_s contains the I2C transfer parameters. This is passed as an argument to lld_i2c_transfer() API.

Field Documentation

uint8_t* lld_hsi2c_datatfr_params_s::buffer

Data buffer

uint32_t lld_hsi2c_datatfr_params_s::bufLen

Length of buffer

uint32_t lld_hsi2c_datatfr_params_s::flags

Flags to indicate the various modes of operation

uint8_t lld_hsi2c_datatfr_params_s::slaveAddr

Address of the slave to talk to, not valid in Slave mode

uint32_t lld_hsi2c_datatfr_params_s::timeout

Timeout value
